test_cases.name: Validate API Authentication Enforcement
test_cases.description: Verify all API endpoints require valid authentication tokens.
test_cases.scenario: Send a POST request to /api/deploy without valid OAuth2/JWT token and check for 401 Unauthorized response.

test_cases.name: Test Database Access Controls
test_cases.description: Confirm unauthorized users cannot modify database records.
test_cases.scenario: Attempt to update application configuration in the database using a non-administrator account.
